description: Interrogator Knight now turns his attention to a subordinate, Danny Somers.  He gives Somers orders to strip and immediately fingers and fucks his sub.  With Somers on his knees, he creams on Knight's boot and receives orders to polish it clean.
series: The Abduction Series, Part I - The Abduction
title: The Abduction Series, Part I - The Abduction, Scene #05
